title: 不懂就问，匠魂部分材质变白
author: Makelo

replies.author: 九耀龙翔
replies.txt_content:
是否安装了TexFix，删除它，那mod和匠魂不兼容，问题挺多
FoamFix-Anarchy + Tinkers Construct: You will find to have some Tinkers Construct tools have just white, Textures. Sadly i can't fix that since its a multible things combined causes this issue.    
To fix that issue for you disable the dynamicItemModels option in FoamFix-Anarchy Config. This is only a issue with the Anarchy version. The law version is totally fine!
Foamfix Anarchy+Tinkers Construct（匠魂）引发的问题：你会发现一些匠魂的工具只会有白色材质（或者别的问题）。我很遗憾修复不了这个，因为这是一些复杂因素共同导致的问题。解决这个问题，你可以在Foamfix Anarchy的配置文件（config）里面将dynamicItemModels选项设定为false，当然你也可以选用Foamfix Lawful，这个没有问题。

replies.author: PTSD∝龌龊闵
replies.txt_content: 那些装备的材质就是白色的

replies.author: Makelo
replies.txt_content: 这是材质bug吧，钴稿子都成白色的了，后面的阿迪特也是
